definitions.title: n.f. unit.
definitions.body: a ship—abs. Jon 1:3 + 3 t.; Pl. abs. [[אֳנִיּוׂת]] De 28:68 +; [[אֳונִ֠יּוֹת]] 2Ch 8:18; cstr. = abs. 1Ki 22:49 +, etc.;—a ship Pr 30:19, Ge 49:13, De 28:68, Ju Jdg 5:17 (where, however, cf. Bu:BB Richter u. Sam. p. 16 on text) 1Ki 22:49, 1Ki 22:50, Is 43:14, 2Ch 8:18, 2Ch 20:36, 2Ch 20:37, Jon 1:4, Jon 1:5, Ps 104:26, Ps 107:23, Da 11:40; [[הַיָּם]] ´[[א]] Ez Eze 27:9; propelled by oars Ez Eze 27:29; esp. [[תַּרְשִׁישׁ]]´[[א]] (cf. [[אֳנִי]]) 1Ki 22:49, 2Ch 9:21 (cf. 1Ki 10:22 supr. sub [[אֳנִי]]) Ps 48:8, Is 2:16, Is 23:1, Is 23:14, Is 60:9, Ez Eze 27:25; late of ship going to Tarshish 2Ch 9:21, 2Ch 20:36, Jon 1:3; merchant-ship, [[סוֹחֵר]] ´[[א]] Pr 31:14; [[אֵבֶָה]] ´[[א]] swift ships Job 9:26 (cf. [[אבה]]); seamen [[אַנְשֵׁי־אֳנִיּוֹת]] 1Ki 9:27.
